metadata.title: IP Address Enrichment - Cisco Meraki
metadata.description: This playbook checks if malicious IP address is blocked or unblocked by Cisco Meraki MX network.
mainSteps: 1. Fetches a list of potentially malicious IP addresses
2. Enrich the incident with IP status information.
prerequisites: 1. Deploy the Cisco Meraki Custom Connector before the deployment of this playbook under the same subscription and same resource group. Capture the name of the connector during deployment.
2. Cisco Meraki API Key should be known to establish a connection with Cisco Meraki Custom Connector.
